member.name: DDP_FILE_EXTENT
member.summary: DDP_FILE_EXTENT represents the extent of data in a file that is to be read in a pending call toReadBackupFile.

member.name: DDP_FILE_EXTENT.Length
member.summary: Length, in bytes, of the extent.

member.name: DDP_FILE_EXTENT.Offset
member.summary: Offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the file to the beginning of the extent.
